ED_Title: Eradication of poverty and other development issues
ED_DecisionText:
At its 74th meeting, on 20 December 2017, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Second Committee. 


(See A/72/424; A/72/PV.74)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/72/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
